text: ye’alahimi chirotana izinetu banite layi balinebere noro ke’inesu yehonu ch’ifirochi liyasasituhi basebu neberi፡፡ nefisochachewinimi iniji lelani ayasasitumi፡፡ beminimi ayigoduhimi፡፡ alahimi be’anite layi mets’ihafinina t’ibebini awerede፡፡ yematawik’ewinimi hulu asitemarehi፡፡ ye’alahimi chirota be’anite layi talak’i newi፡፡
